mapper.select: SELECT PRODUCT_NO as productNo , PC.CATEGORY_NAME as categoryName , PRODUCT_NAME as productName , PRODUCT_DESC as productDesc , PRODUCT_CREDIT as productCredit , PRODUCT_AMOUNT as productAmount , FC.FAMILY_CUST_NICKNAME as familyCustNickname , D.DELIVERY_NAME as deliveryName , P.DELIVERY_NO as deliveryNo FROM PRODUCT P INNER JOIN PRODUCT_CATEGORY PC ON P.CATEGORY_NO = PC.CATEGORY_NO AND PC.USE_YN = 'Y' INNER JOIN DELIVERY D ON P.DELIVERY_NO = D.DELIVERY_NO AND D.USE_YN = 'Y' INNER JOIN CUSTOM C ON P.REG_CUST_NO = C.CUST_NO AND C.USE_YN = 'Y' INNER JOIN FAMILY_CUSTOM FC ON C.FAMILY_CUST_NO = FC.FAMILY_CUST_NO AND FC.USE_YN = 'Y' WHERE P.PRODUCT_NO = #{productNo} AND P.USE_YN = 'Y'
